segments.text: This man looks very handsome.Is he married ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure.He has already married , a father of two boys .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I can't believe it.He looks very young .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He took the picture when he was only 21 years old .
segments.speaker: S2
